quotes.text: I don't really think about why I climb. I just simply love it.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: The only purpose of training is not just getting better and stronger. The goal should be the training itself. It can be very fun.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: Instead of saying I'm going training, I always said I'm going climbing. Which means I'm going to have some fun.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: It is about turning pain into joy. That is what every good climber should be good at.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: Every failure motivates me, eventually, to make something different, train harder, and come better prepared for the next challenge.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: What really motivates me to climb harder is not to show who's best, but climbing harder routes makes it more fun.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: The harder routes you climb, the more interesting the climbing gets and the more crazy moves you are forced to figure out.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: Climbing in a beautiful location, the goal is not to power my way up but to become for that moment a part of the landscape, part of the rock.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: People often say: train hard! Yes, try hard when you are actually climbing, but spend your time in the gym in a smart and efficient way.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: Every December I take two or three weeks off. After an entire season of training and climbing, my body needs the break.
quotes.author: Adam Ondra

quotes.text: I try to expand my comfort zone by practicing the moves over and over again. I work through the fear, until it's just not scary anymore.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.text: Anyone can be happy and cosy. Nothing good happens in the world by being happy and cosy.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.text: If you want to improve, focus on your weaknesses. If you want to perform, focus on your strengths.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.text: It's about being a warrior. You face your fear because your goal demands it. That is the warrior spirit.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.text: If you spend 20 years of preparation on something, eventually you're comfortable doing things that used to seem insane.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.text: I think it's the best thing in life to be able to take the one thing you love the most and have it work out that you can make a living that way.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.text: Imagine an Olympic-gold-medal-level athletic achievement that, if you don't get that gold medal, you're gonna die. That's pretty much what free soloing El Cap is like.
quotes.author: Tommy Caldwell

quotes.text: After a few months of overtraining, you dig yourself in a hole so deep it can take several months to get out of it.
quotes.author: Tommy Caldwell

quotes.text: Trad climbing is about taking calculated risks and trusting yourself and your gear.
quotes.author: Tommy Caldwell

quotes.text: Staying authentic to yourself and accepting how you feel… It's all about your attitude and the story that you tell yourself.
quotes.author: Lynn Hill

quotes.text: Sport climbing is about creativity, problem-solving, and the joy of movement.
quotes.author: Lynn Hill

quotes.text: It won't go free… today.
quotes.author: Lynn Hill
quotes.note: Said after her accidental fall on The Nose, 1989. Legendary quote in climbing.

quotes.text: The process of working a project — falling off, learning, coming back — that is the real journey.
quotes.author: Chris Sharma

quotes.text: Climbing isn't about getting to the top. It's about the process of becoming someone who can.
quotes.author: Chris Sharma

quotes.text: The summit is only half the battle.
quotes.author: Reinhold Messner

quotes.text: In the mountains, there are only two grades: you can either do it or you can't.
quotes.author: Reinhold Messner

quotes.text: Mountains are not stadiums where I satisfy my ambition to achieve. They are the cathedrals where I practice my religion.
quotes.author: Anatoli Boukreev

quotes.text: The purpose of climbing is not to conquer the rock, but to conquer yourself.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.text: The best climber in the world is the one having the most fun.
quotes.author: Alex Lowe

quotes.text: It's not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.text: Sport climbing is like a dance with the wall, where the music is the sound of your breath and the beat of your heart.
quotes.author: Janja Garnbret

quotes.text: Every move on the wall is a conversation between you and the rock. Listen carefully.
quotes.author: Janja Garnbret

quotes.text: Climb the mountains not to plant your flag, but to embrace the challenge, enjoy the air, and behold the view.
quotes.author: David McCullough Jr.

quotes.text: The mountains are calling, and I must go.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: Mountains have a way of dealing with overconfidence.
quotes.author: Hermann Buhl

quotes.text: Climbing is not about the rock. It's about what the rock makes of you.
quotes.author: Detto popolare arrampicata

quotes.text: Your maximum is the minimum.
quotes.author: Detto classico climbing

quotes.text: The rock doesn't lie. Your fingers do.
quotes.author: Detto popolare arrampicata

quotes.text: A send is just a fail you haven't committed to yet.
quotes.author: Detto popolare bouldering

quotes.text: The only bad session is the one you didn't show up for.
quotes.author: Detto popolare climbing

quotes.text: Sport climbing is not just about competition, it's about the community, the friendships, and the shared passion.
quotes.author: Margo Hayes

quotes.text: Trad climbing is about adventure, exploration, and pushing your limits in the natural world.
quotes.author: Alex Honnold

quotes.text: The rock is a teacher. Every fall is a lesson.
quotes.author: Detto popolare arrampicata

quotes.text: A good rest day is part of training, not a skip from training.
quotes.author: Eric Hörst

quotes.text: Footwork is 80% of climbing. The hands just follow.
quotes.author: Detto popolare climbing

quotes.text: The crux is always one move past the point where you thought you'd fall.
quotes.author: Detto popolare climbing

quotes.text: Confidence in climbing comes not from the absence of fear, but from facing it on the rock, move after move.
quotes.author: Steph Davis

quotes.text: Trad climbing is the art of finding the line and making it happen.
quotes.author: Steph Davis

quotes.text: Every route is a conversation. Some days you lead, some days the rock leads.
quotes.author: Detto popolare arrampicata

quotes.text: In climbing, style matters as much as success. How you get up is as important as whether you get up.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The mind always fails first, not the body. The secret is to make your mind work for you, not against you.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: You can have results or excuses. Not both.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone who is not a champion.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Training gives us an outlet for suppressed energies created by stress and thus tones the spirit just as exercise conditions the body.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: What we face may look insurmountable. But I learned that we are always stronger than we know.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: There are no shortcuts — everything is reps, reps, reps.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The secret is contained in a three-part formula: self-confidence, a positive mental attitude, and honest hard work.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: While others were out partying, I was training. While they were dancing at the clubs, I was training.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: For me, life is continuously being hungry. The meaning of life is not simply to exist, but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: What is the point of being on this Earth if you are going to be like everyone else?
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: From the bodybuilding days on, I learned that everything is reps and mileage. The more miles you ski, the better a skier you become.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Champions aren't made in the gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them — a desire, a dream, a vision.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: The fight is won or lost far away from witnesses, behind the lines, in the gym, and out there on the road, long before I dance under those lights.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Excellence is not a singular act, but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal (attr. Aristotele)

quotes.text: The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
quotes.author: Proverbio militare / Richard Marcinko

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
quotes.author: Detto popolare

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: The pain of discipline is far less than the pain of regret.
quotes.author: Sarah Bombell

quotes.text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.text: Progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Detto popolare fitness

quotes.text: Repetition is the mother of learning, the father of action, which makes it the architect of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Be like water making its way through cracks. Do not be assertive, but adjust to the object, and you shall find a way around or through it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless — like water. Now, water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Hack away at the unessential.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: A fight is not won by one punch or kick. Either learn to endure or hire a bodyguard.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Life is never stagnation. It is constant movement, as we as constant change. Things live by moving and gain strength as they go.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The highest technique is to have no technique. My technique is the result of your technique.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Remember: actual sparring is the ultimate, and the training is only a means towards this.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Simplicity is the key to brilliance.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: All type of knowledge ultimately means self-knowledge.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Real living is living for others.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Man, the living creature, the creating individual, is always more important than any established style or system.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Notice that the stiffest tree is most easily cracked, while the bamboo or willow survives by bending with the wind.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: If you learn to use this body as an instrument, it is the most fantastic and powerful instrument on the planet.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: The basis of yoga is this: to be absolutely intense and relaxed at the same time.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: If you want your body and brain to work well, the first thing is to become joyful by your own nature.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: Once your thought, emotion, and energies are organised in one direction, your ability to create and manifest what you want is phenomenal.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: If you resist change, you resist life.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: Yoga does not mean just standing on your head or holding your breath. It means taking charge of your life.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: Only when you are absolutely devoted to what you do, you can produce something significant in the world.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: Neither health nor joy can be created from outside. There may be external stimuli, but essentially, both come from within.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: The very way you breathe, sit, stand, eat, walk, work — everything can become yoga.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: Meditation means dissolving the invisible walls that unawareness has built.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.text: Your body exists in the past and your mind exists in the future. In yoga, they come together in the present.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.text: Yoga is a mirror to look at ourselves from within.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.text: Meditation is the art of knowing how to focus your mind.
quotes.author: Swami Rama

quotes.text: Do not worry about the past or the future. Live in the eternal present.
quotes.author: Swami Rama

quotes.text: A mountain is composed of tiny grains of earth. The ocean is made up of tiny drops of water. Even so, life is but an endless series of little details and actions.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.text: Asana is not a performance but an exploration.
quotes.author: Prashant Iyengar

quotes.text: Breath is the bridge between the outer and the inner.
quotes.author: Prashant Iyengar

quotes.text: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marco Aurelio (Meditazioni)

quotes.text: You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marco Aurelio

quotes.text: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marco Aurelio

quotes.text: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
quotes.author: Marco Aurelio

quotes.text: If it is not right, do not do it; if it is not true, do not say it.
quotes.author: Marco Aurelio

quotes.text: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: It is not that I am brave, it is just that I am busy.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: Per aspera ad astra. Attraverso l'asprezza alle stelle.
quotes.author: Seneca (attr.)

quotes.text: Nusquam est qui ubique est. Chi è ovunque non è da nessuna parte. Concentrati su ciò che conta.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: Seek not good fortune to be free from misfortune, but rather, courage equal to your misfortune.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epitteto

quotes.text: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epitteto

quotes.text: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
quotes.author: Epitteto

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotele

quotes.text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotele

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: One must have chaos in oneself to give birth to a dancing star.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try.
quotes.author: Yoda (Star Wars)

quotes.text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Proverbio giapponese

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Laozi (Tao Te Ching)

quotes.text: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: Water is fluid, soft, and yielding. But water will wear away rock, which is rigid and cannot yield. Whatever is fluid, soft, and yielding will overcome whatever is rigid and hard.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.text: The will to win is not nearly as important as the will to prepare to win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: There is nothing outside of yourself that can ever enable you to get better, stronger, richer, quicker, or smarter. Everything is within. Seek nothing outside of yourself.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi (Il Libro dei Cinque Anelli)

quotes.text: Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.text: The primary thing when you take a sword in your hands is your intention to cut the enemy, whatever the means.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.text: Today is victory over yourself of yesterday; tomorrow is your victory over lesser men.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.text: Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: The earth has music for those who listen.
quotes.author: George Santayana (attr.)

quotes.text: Adventures are worthwhile in themselves.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: It's always further than it looks. It's always taller than it looks. And it's always harder than it looks.
quotes.author: Detto alpinistico (The 3 Rules of Alpinism)

quotes.text: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
quotes.author: Detto popolare

quotes.text: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.text: Going to the mountains is going home.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: The canyon walls don't care about your project grade. Just climb.
quotes.author: Detto popolare outdoor climbing

quotes.text: On the rock, the mind clears. The noise of the world falls away, and only the next hold matters.
quotes.author: Detto popolare arrampicata

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucio

quotes.text: Endure the discomfort of growth, or endure the pain of staying the same.
quotes.author: Detto popolare

quotes.text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
quotes.author: Detto popolare sport

quotes.text: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only option.
quotes.author: Bob Marley (attr.)

quotes.text: Do not count the days. Make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.text: Dreams are lovely. But they are just dreams. Fuzzy and insubstantial. Wish fulfillment. Climbing requires hard work.
quotes.author: Felicity Aston

quotes.text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Detto popolare sport

quotes.text: The hard days are the best because that's when champions are made.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The comeback is always stronger than the setback.
quotes.author: Detto popolare sport

quotes.text: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
quotes.author: Emil Zátopek

quotes.text: To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift.
quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.text: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've failed over and over again. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Deload week: the most productive session you almost skipped.
quotes.author: Detto popolare powerlifting

quotes.text: One more attempt. Said every climber, forever.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Chalk does not lie. Your fingers do.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Active recovery: watching others train while holding a sports drink.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: It is a 7a. It just feels like an 8a. It is still a 7a.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Deload week: your body's thank-you note. Your ego did not sign it.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Outdoor climbing: same moves, worse holds, better photos.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: RPE 10: when you look at the route and already know.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Warmup is optional. Technically.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Linear progression always works. Until it does not. Then add volume.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: "Just a couple of hours at the crag." — 6 hours ago.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: The project is not hard. It is just not done yet.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Hangboard: a torture device you bought willingly and called training.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Grip strength: the KPI of people who actually send things.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: If your training does not scare you a little, it is probably a warmup.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Note to future self: that route was actually hard. It was not the tiredness.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Your future self will thank you for today's rest. Your current self disagrees. Your current self is wrong.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Power endurance: the reason you train, and also the reason you cry.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: That 7b you have been projecting for 6 months is not a route. It is a mirror.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Every impossible sequence is just a sequence you have not figured out yet. Usually.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1

quotes.text: Sending is great. But climbing outside with friends, sunshine, and a sandwich in your bag — that is the whole point.
quotes.author: AI Dani — climb-agent v1
